item.description: I'm pretty sure Anne M- #1 anttendee found this place and sent me a note about this and I know Dawn and my Wife have checked it out, I was brought back some sushi from there and I have to tell you this was some pretty inventive and creatively tasty stuff. I had a roll with guacamole on top....need I say more. So I now This is a little out of our usually sushi path, but I think it will be worth it. Look forward to seeing you all there....old memebrs and new. Also sorry about The Feb meetup but things got a little changed about. See everyone in March!

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Out of the Way sushi: It's worth it.
